name: Extraction and Escape Tactics
description: Advanced techniques for escaping hostile zones and extracting high-value personnel.

cards.title: Evading Pursuers and Escape Routes
cards.description: Utilizing terrain and cover to evade detection and reach extraction points.
cards.bulletpoints: Escape route planning, terrain utilization, counter-tracking techniques
cards.summaryText: Scout redundant escape lanes, use terrain masking, and deploy counter-tracking tricks to shake pursuit and hit the pickup zone clean.

cards.title: Tactical Extraction of High-Value Targets
cards.description: Planning and executing rescue operations under high-risk conditions.
cards.bulletpoints: Fast extraction planning, defensive positioning, securing personnel
cards.summaryText: Coordinate rapid extraction teams that secure the package, hold defensive arcs, and exfil under layered contingency plans.
